title: Fix Docs workflow Pages deploy failure
description: Docs workflow fails because GitHub Pages is not enabled. Adjust docs workflow to build-only by default or gate deploy until Pages is enabled, so CI passes.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Docs workflow deploy job now gated on repository variable DOCS_DEPLOY == 'true' to avoid failure when Pages is not enabled.
